dct_alternative_sm: Africa ligt gegen Mittag und ist der Wärmeste Theil der Welt = L'Afrique la partie du monde la plus chaude vers le midi
dct_description_sm: E. Bæck d. H. sculps et exc. a. v.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines around margins.
Coordinates are approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Decorative banner and cartouche with indigenous peoples.
Shows topography, drainage, islands surrounding continent, political boundaries.
6 coats of arms along left and right margins, as well as 10 coats of arms outlines.
Possibly appears in Baeck's Atlas geographicus ... , Ausburg, 1710.
